page.topic: Record at Start and at End Functions

section.description: As a result of the changes to the Browse, the following new methods are available:

case.title: .record_at_start([tableAlias])
case.description: returns true if focus is on the first record in the table

case.title: .record_at_end([tableAlias])
case.description: returns true if focus is on the last record in the table.

section.title: Example
section.description: Assume you have a button on the Invoice form in Alphasports. This form has 'invoice_items' as a one-to-many child table
Returns .t. if focus is on the first record in the embedded invoice_items Browse.
